verbs.description: Donald Trump [V: has] not been treating the United States ' allies as he should . This weekend , during the G7 summit , Trump arrived late to a meeting with our closest allies , issued threats , called on Russia to be readmitted to the group , and then stormed out early .

Donald Trump has not [V: been] treating the United States ' allies as he should . This weekend , during the G7 summit , Trump arrived late to a meeting with our closest allies , issued threats , called on Russia to be readmitted to the group , and then stormed out early .
